title: Terms & Conditions of Use
acceptLabel: I accept the terms and conditions

s1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
s1.body: By registering or using the app, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part, you should not use the app.

s2.title: 2. Definitions
s2.body:
User: Any person using the app, including NGOs, community leaders, volunteers, or visitors.
Malnutrition case: A report created by users about a person affected by malnutrition.
We/Us: The development team of the Ra√≠ces de Vida application.

s3.title: 3. Use of the App
s3.body:
Only real, verifiable, non-commercial information may be recorded.
Using the app to spread false, violent, or discriminatory content is not allowed.
Uploaded content must respect the privacy and dignity of affected individuals.

s4.title: 4. User Responsibility
s4.body:
Users are responsible for the accuracy of the data they enter.
Improper use may result in suspension or deletion of the account.

s5.title: 5. Privacy & Data Protection
s5.body:
The app stores personal data solely for contact and coordination of aid.
Data will be anonymized to protect identity.
Personal information will not be shared without consent.

s6.title: 6. Notifications
s6.body:
The app may send notifications about new cases, campaigns, or assistance.
You can disable them from your device settings.

s7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
s7.body: All app content is owned by the development team or licensed for its use.

s8.title: 8. Changes
s8.body: We may modify these terms at any time and will notify you of relevant changes.

s9.title: 9. Support & Contact
s9.body: For questions or technical reports, please write to our support email.
